post:
**[Limitless Hosting](https://limitlesshost.net)** provides affordable, and quality shared/reseller hosting. It was found in 2015 and used to provide other digital services such as game server hosting.

**Website**: https://limitlesshost.net

We have brought some amazing special offers for LET users, starting from **$2.4/year**!
All offers are **RECURRING**, pay same price every year!

**Web Hosting Offers:**
**XS Shared Hosting**
- 1 GB SSD
- 50 GB Bandwidth
- 1 Addon Domain
- 5 MySQL Database
Price: **$2.4/year**
[Order now (USA)](https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/letspecials/?group_id=42&pricing_id=346)
[Order now (EU)](https://my.limitlesshost.net/order/config/index/letspecials/?group_id=42&pricing_id=343)
